title: Why did I get a perma ban for this?

replies.body:
5 lines into your first game:

>DemonRain: you fucking half wit ape
>DemonRain: you are a mass bay ape
>DemonRain: stop talking to me
>DemonRain: its a community college for fucking retards like you

And this type of flaming and harassment is continued in all three of these games that were referenced.
you obviously had some sort of punishment before. and this was completely toxic and probably worth a 14 day on its own

>DemonRain: im not a getting a ban

>DemonRain: you are getting a ban

https://i.imgur.com/1QMq6MF.gif

The entirety of your chat logs is pretty much only flaming and harassing others. None of it is acceptable.

As for this being a permanent ban, have you had any punishments prior to this, particularly a 14 day ban? If so, that's why this is a permanent ban. Every time you are punished, you move up to the next punishment tier, and unfortunately for you, a permanent ban is the next step after a 14 day ban. Riot even warns you of this in your 14 day ban reform card.
